mainText:
I haven't always been a fan of Apple products, being a PC user from around 5
years old (I'm almost 33 now) and having only recently converted to a
MacBook Pro, but you can't deny all that he's done for the computer industry
as a whole.  Some of my fondest memories as a kid were using the old Apple
II systems at school, learning how to type, playing Oregon Trail, writing
small programs in BASIC, and everything else we did.  From his ideas, to his
charisma, you could always tell his true excitement in talking about and
releasing new products.  He was a true pioneer in his field and he will be
greatly missed.
author: Jeremy
